me.name: Susan Cue
me.bio: Mid-level software engineer with full-stack experience working in the .NET, Node.js, and Ruby ecosystems

experience: Two years of professional experience working with Angular, ASP.NET Web API, and SQL Server in an Agile production environment
Five years working with Ruby building installable gems for Unix systems
Experience using Angular, React, and Vue to develop dynamic web front-ends
Experience with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP
Experience designing and implementing relational databases with multiple flavors of SQL
Experience with the Unix terminal, Node.js, and Git
Experience using various cloud resources in Microsoft Azure
intangibles: Forward-thinking mentality; continually learning and using the newest technologies and techniques
Adept at self-studying and problem solving; evidenced by expert-level computer skills
Excellent writing and communication skills affirmed in both academic and professional settings

roles.title: Junior Software Developer
highlights: Provided user requirements analysis, design and programming support for enhancement of Web application accessed by 5 million users worldwide.
Fueled additional revenue stream through responsive customer support, generating $18K in new license sales within first three weeks of new product release.

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Contributed software engineering expertise in the development of products through the software lifecycle, from requirements defintion through successful deployment.
Facilitated customization of systems by encouraging software engineering team to adopt emerging standards for software application development architecture and tools.
Introduced methodologies and best practices that enhanced product definition, release processes and customization of applications to user needs.

roles.title: Application Developer
highlights: Facilitated customization of systems by encouraging software engineering team to adopt emerging standards for software application development architecture and tools.
Introduced methodologies and best practices that enhanced product definition, release processes and customization of applications to user needs.
Provided user requirements analysis, design and programming support for enhancement of Web application accessed by 5 million users worldwide.
Fueled additional revenue stream through responsive customer support, generating $18K in new license sales within first three weeks of new product release.
